REUTERS.UNKNOWN: F f2036 reute h f BC-CYANOTECH-<CYAN>-SETS 03-25 0057

TEXT.TITLE: CYANOTECH <CYAN> SETS WAY TO EXTRACT CAROTENE
TEXT.BODY: Cyanotech Corp said it has developed a new way to extract beta carotene from algae. The company said the method reduces energy requirements by 70 pct and produces 90 pct recovery. The company has been a commercial producer of beta carotene since May, 1986. Reuter
